Enabled.title: Welcome to FireCloud!
Enabled.message: You have free compute and storage credits available to upload your data and launch analyses.

Enrolled.title: Access Free Credits
Enrolled.message: You currently have access to your free credits. Learn how to use FireCloud, about this free credit period, and transitioning to your own billing account once the free credits have expired.

Terminated.title: Your free credits have expired
Terminated.message: Your data will be stored for 30 days from credit expiration date. Learn how you can create your own Google Billing Account and move your data to continue working.
